metadata.dcterms:title: Identifying and Modeling Evaporite Facies using Well Logs: Characterising the Devonian Elk Point Group salt giant
metadata.dcterms:creator: Lord, Elaine
metadata.dcterms:description: This dataverse is associated with a masters degree titled "Identifying and Modeling Evaporite Facies using Well Logs: Characterising the Devonian Elk Point Group salt giant" by Elaine Lord (2020). Figures and well tables are included.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
Evaporite sedimentology
Salt giant
Prairie Evaporite
